attributes.action: screen men at the age of 40 to have a PSA test for prostate cancer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Men should have a blood test at the age of 40 onwards (psa) for Prostate Cancer, as this disease is becoming more common in recent years

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "screen men at the age of 40 to have a PSA test for prostate cancer."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18392


Prime Minister's Office
